about_the_game:
You don't remember who you are. Act like her. Talk like her.

Am I Nima puts you in control of Nima’s fractured mind. Trapped in a dimly lit basement, you must navigate once-familiar rooms, unlocking hidden memories and piecing together the truth behind your captivity.

You start with nothing, your thoughts a blank slate. As you explore, you uncover words and concepts tied to the objects around you: a worn-out plushie, a locked drawer, an old note scribbled in hurried handwriting. These words become the building blocks of your understanding. But knowledge alone isn’t enough—you must actively combine words in your mind, experimenting with different pairings to unlock deeper meanings and access buried memories.

Some combinations spark sudden realizations, flooding your vision with glimpses of the past. Others twist and distort, revealing unsettling contradictions in what you think you know. The more you uncover, the more questions arise: Why has your mother locked you in the basement? What do these tests mean? And why does every failure make the pain in your head worse?

content_descriptors.notes: Violence towards animals including bugs and fish. Implied violence towards a dog.

short_description: Am I Nima is a psychological-horror game where you must convince your mom that you really are her daughter. Combine words together in your brain and use them to talk. Get her to trust you.
